DOC.detailed_description: To investigate serum urine concentration terbutaline evaluate difference inhale terbutaline ( 2 mg ) oral terbutaline ( 10 mg ) order distinguish dope terbutaline anti-asthmatic treatment terbutaline . To investigate mention three group : healthy men , male asthmatic subject male elite athlete asthma .
DOC.criteria: Physiciandiagnosed asthma positive reversibility challenge test . Informed consent . Age 18 45 year . Sex : male . Asthma classify mild moderate accord GINA guideline . Used beta2agonist minimum 12 month . Smokers exsmokers smoke history 10 pack year . Respiratory tract infection within last 2 week prior visit 1 2 . Subjects chronic disease asthma allergy . Allergy towards study medicine . Use beta2agonist 6 day prior study day .
